mapper.select: SELECT rn, dig_seq, pt_seq, medi_seq, diseas, content, dig_date FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() over (PARTITION BY SUBSTR(dig_date,1,8) ORDER BY dig_date) rn, dig_seq, pt_seq, medi_seq, diseas, content, dig_date FROM dig WHERE SUBSTR(dig_date,1,6)=#{yyyyMM} ) dig1 WHERE rn BETWEEN 1 AND 4;
